column1: Kata Robata////Also ordered the chirashi and the lobster mac and cheese.  When they dropped off the chirashi at our table
column2: they gave me an extra bowl full of sashimi.  I thought they had accidentally left it there
column3: but it turned out that it was part of the chirashi.  Needless to say
column4: great value.  The lobster mac and cheese was good too
column5: but it really ended up being an afterthought after all the delicious fish we had.
